casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Leroy McNELL. No. 37A87-6. Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 5, 2005. M. Gordon Widenhouse, Chapel Hill, Robert H. Hale, Jr., for McNeil. C. Colon Willoughby, District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 2nd day of August 2005 by Plaintiff for Extension of Time to File State's Response to Petition for Writ of Certiorari on September 2, 2005:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 5th day of August 2005."
